articles.title: Technical Call: Tata Steel- BUY - BusinessLine
articles.description: Buy Tata Steel at current levels. Accumulate on dips. Keep stop-loss at ₹98. Trail up to ₹125, ₹138. Exit long positions at ₹150-155. Outlook bullish; uptrend since April 2020 intact. Supports at ₹115-105; resistance-turned-support at ₹105. Target ₹150-155 in…
